mapper.select:
SELECT f.total_order_count, f.total_money, f.many_order_count, f.many_money, f.many_tax_money, f.total_tax_money, e.id, e.account_name, e.mobile_code, e.idcard_code, e.attestation, e.agreementUrl, e.create_date FROM tb_worker e JOIN
f ON e.id = f.worker_id
AND e.id like CONCAR('%',#{workerId},'%')
AND e.account_name like CONCAR('%',#{workerName},'%')
AND e.idcard_code like CONCAR('%',#{idCardCode},'%')
AND e.create_date like CONCAR('%',#{startDate},'%')
AND e.create_date like CONCAR('%',#{endDate},'%')
